Goal: Only if poverty can be reduced for  rural family, we can make easy to solve our business solution The Main Fact to reduce poverty of the rural is to get Daily Earning for their life.	For example there is poultry.	You can get egg daily and so can get earning daily.	When you get the eggs , you have to make small bites who made by rural ladies which is consistent with the Gender Equality. And men are farming and making poultry. Other family, Other villagers also grow maize seeds for poultry, which will be in line with income.
GoalMessage: Therefore, the aim of Digital MM Farm is to create equitable equities for city dwellers and rural family.
